page.title: 03WEEKEND IN GILMORTON
page.content: 7.40am:Made a cup of tea for Mum and Dad.Read "Patches"comic. 8.00am:Go back to bed and read "The Dark Is Rising" by Susan Cooper,it's exciting and thrilling.Then I listened to Radio One. 8.25am:Had breakfast,Shreddies. 8.40am:Showered and dressed - jeans,tee-shirt,jumper. 8.57am:Mum plaits my hair. 9.00am:Off to Leicester in the car. 9.25am:Buy skirt from Marks & Spencer,pastel pink jumper and red and white beads from Lewis'sGo to market 12 noon:Go home,have lunch. 2.00pm:Play tennis with friend on Gilmorton tennis courts. 6.45pm:Mark's party,a roller-disco in Lutterworth. 8.30pm:Had tea,beefburger,crisps,Coke. 9.15:Home to bed.
